verses.name: Psalms 51:1
verses.text: Have mercy upon me, O God, according to thy lovingkindness: according unto the multitude of thy tender mercies blot out my transgressions.

verses.name: Psalms 51:2
verses.text: Wash me throughly from mine iniquity, and cleanse me from my sin.

verses.name: Psalms 51:3
verses.text: For I acknowledge my transgressions: and my sin is ever before me.

verses.name: Psalms 51:4
verses.text: Against thee, thee only, have I sinned, and done this evil in thy sight: that thou mightest be justified when thou speakest, and be clear when thou judgest.

verses.name: Psalms 51:5
verses.text: Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me.

verses.name: Psalms 51:6
verses.text: Behold, thou desirest truth in the inward parts: and in the hidden part thou shalt make me to know wisdom.

verses.name: Psalms 51:7
verses.text: Purge me with hyssop, and I shall be clean: wash me, and I shall be whiter than snow.

verses.name: Psalms 51:8
verses.text: Make me to hear joy and gladness; that the bones which thou hast broken may rejoice.

verses.name: Psalms 51:9
verses.text: Hide thy face from my sins, and blot out all mine iniquities.

verses.name: Psalms 51:10
verses.text: Create in me a clean heart, O God; and renew a right spirit within me.

verses.name: Psalms 51:11
verses.text: Cast me not away from thy presence; and take not thy holy spirit from me.

verses.name: Psalms 51:12
verses.text: Restore unto me the joy of thy salvation; and uphold me with thy free spirit.

verses.name: Psalms 51:13
verses.text: Then will I teach transgressors thy ways; and sinners shall be converted unto thee.

verses.name: Psalms 51:14
verses.text: Deliver me from bloodguiltiness, O God, thou God of my salvation: and my tongue shall sing aloud of thy righteousness.

verses.name: Psalms 51:15
verses.text: O Lord, open thou my lips; and my mouth shall shew forth thy praise.

verses.name: Psalms 51:16
verses.text: For thou desirest not sacrifice; else would I give it: thou delightest not in burnt offering.

verses.name: Psalms 51:17
verses.text: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.

verses.name: Psalms 51:18
verses.text: Do good in thy good pleasure unto Zion: build thou the walls of Jerusalem.

verses.name: Psalms 51:19
verses.text: Then shalt thou be pleased with the sacrifices of righteousness, with burnt offering and whole burnt offering: then shall they offer bullocks upon thine altar.
